mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PUB_PST_LIKE WHERE PST_IDX = #{pstIdx} AND USER_IDX = #{loginUserIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PUB_PST_LIKE WHERE PST_IDX = #{pstIdx} AND USER_IDX = #{loginUserIdx}) > 0 AS isLiked, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PUB_PST_LIKE WHERE PST_IDX = #{pstIdx}) AS likeCount
